user.name: Cucumber Huang
about: I am a software engineer at Microsoft. And I think Microsoft is the greatest company in the world.
I am Chinese and I love Chinese food. I could not live without rice. I love taking photos even though I am not good at it.
I am so lucky that I met the most Glamorous girl.
Feel free to contact with email if you like my photos. Email: huangjp.pku@gmail.com

post_list.title: Color Run!!! GoGoGo...
post_list.text: Seattle Color Run (Or Color Walk maybe) was hosted on May 13rd this year. It was such a great fun to run in the color, jump around the bubbles and sing among friends. Some families came with their kids inside the baby carriage. Cute doggies are dyed with blue, red and yellow. You can visit this website if you need more information.

post_list.title: This is a thinker
post_list.text: The Thinker sculpture at Papua New Guinea Sculpture Garden of Stanford.

post_list.title: Hoover Tower
post_list.text: Check the Hoover Tower and the fountain inside Stanfood University.

post_list.title: Give me a big smile
post_list.text: The photo is taken while taking the ferry to Point No Point Light House.

post_list.title: Good Evening Mount Rainier
post_list.text: You can see Mount Rainier at Microsoft's City Center Plaza.

post_list.title: Looking Down from Hoover Tower
post_list.text: The fountain is just like one sapphire.

post_list.title: Dancing on the water
post_list.text: Shot at the Rattlesnake Ledge Trail.

post_list.title: Scar
post_list.text: It is just like a scar yet beautiful.

post_list.title: Tulip Festival
post_list.text: Words could not describe it. The Skugit Valley Tupli Festival is hosted yearly and is a must-see.

post_list.title: Shoo Shoo Shoo
post_list.text: Seattle is a great place for ski-lovers.
